title: Canaveral National Seashore: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations               Permits & Reservations       PERMITS:  Special Park Use permits are required for activities that take place in the park area which:  ♦ Provide a benefit to an individual, group or organization, rather than the public at large. ♦ Require written authorization and some degree of management control by the NPS in order to protect park resources & the public interest. ♦ Are not prohibited by law or regulation.   (Learn more)   RESERVATIONS:  The Visitor Information Center is your primary source for making reservations for island camping, turtle watch programs, interpretation programs, educational programs, etc. The phone number is: 1-877-444-6777  (Learn more)
